     3.   AMENDMENT OF TERM.  Section 14.1 of the Distributor Agreement is hereby amended to read in its entirety as follows:

          Section 14.1   TERM.  This Agreement shall be effective           through and including March 31, 2004.  Upon the expiration           of such term, this Agreement will renew automatically for           successive terms of one (1) year each unless either party to           this Agreement delivers written notice of termination to the           other party to this Agreement at least sixty (60) days prior           to the end of the original or any renewal term.                 4.
